sentence.Network_en: The children were squirming restlessly in their seats.
sentence.Network_cn: 孩子们在位子上心神不定地动来动去。

sentence.Network_en: He was squirming on the floor in agony.
sentence.Network_cn: 他躺在地上痛苦地扭动着.

sentence.Network_en: AIG's wayward eggheads are not the only ones squirming.
sentence.Network_cn: 焦躁不安的不仅仅只有AIG一意孤行的书呆子.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 蠕_百度百科 ... 蠕动[ wriggle] 蠕蠕[ wriggling;squirming] 蠕形动物[ vermes].
squirm 辗转不安, squirming 蠕变, squirming 蠕动
his brain is squirming like a toad ., 他的脑子像蟾蜍般蠕动.

list.abs: squirming boys ; wiggly worms ; writhing snakes ., 局促不安的孩子 ; 蠕动的虫子 ; 蠕动的蛇.
humans are reduced to squirming masses ., 人格被降低 , 在痛苦中挣扎.
Du Xuan took the reflection for a squirming snake ., 杜宣花了一蛇蠕动反射.
To cause to twist or squirm ; contort ., 扭曲引起扭曲或蠕动 ; 扭曲.

entry.tran: (通常指因紧张不安或不适而)扭动，动来动去
entry.def: If you squirm, you move your body from side to side, usually because you are nervous or uncomfortable.

example.ex: He had squirmed and wriggled and screeched when his father had washed his face...
example.tran: 父亲给他洗脸时，他扭来扭去，尖声喊叫。

example.ex: He gave a feeble shrug and tried to squirm free...
example.tran: 他无力地耸耸肩，扭动身体想要挣脱。

entry.def: If you squirm, you are very embarrassed or ashamed.

example.ex: Mentioning religion is a sure way to make him squirm.
example.tran: 一提宗教就肯定会让他感到窘迫不安。

example.ex: ...the type of awful occasion that makes politicians squirm with embarrassment.
example.tran: 使政客尴尬不安的那种糟糕场合

means.word_mean: 1. having a twisting or snake-like or worm-like motion;

auth_sentence.content: With Bilalov squirming in the background, he added: Well done.
auth_sentence.res_content: With Bilalov squirming in the background, he added: Well done.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: With Bilalov squirming in the background, he added: Well done.

auth_sentence.content: "The manager guys were literally squirming in their seats," Rivellini said.
auth_sentence.res_content: "The manager guys were literally squirming in their seats," Rivellini said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "The manager guys were literally squirming in their seats," Rivellini said.

auth_sentence.content: It squeals in all the right places, squirming under the hefty weight of some serious amplification.
auth_sentence.res_content: It squeals in all the right places, squirming under the hefty weight of some serious amplification.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It squeals in all the right places, squirming under the hefty weight of some serious amplification.
